alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 6:42PM EDT until October 08 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
